title: The Two Sisters-in-law
text: The two women depicted here are Misia Natanson and her sister-in-law, the acress Marthe Mellot. Misia was wife of Thad√©e Natanson, one of the owners and editors of the avant-garde journal <I>La Revue Blanche<I>. This periodical sponsored the art of the Nabis, and both the offices and the Natanson's home became gathering places for the young artists of the group.
